title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Malcolm Gladwell on the terrible endgame of a bombing campaign, Joan Didionâ€™s collected accounts of the American scene, Napoleon the art thief, Victorian mediums and more.
body:
Malcolm Gladwell on the final stage of the war against Japan, and the terrible dilemma that emerged in the bombsights. Review by Paul Kennedy.
Read the review

A multivolume journey with the writer who captured a fragmenting America at the end of the 20th century. Review by Donna Rifkind.
